title: Amount
description: Amount for threshold amount (if it is a fixed amount, not a percentage). Replace thousands or millions by a full number.

title: Percentage
description: Percentage for threshold amount (in percentage, i.e. 3 for 3%)

title: is Multibranch
description: is the Party a Multibranch party?

title: Offices
description: list of offices for the Party when a Multibranch party
